document_info.title: Complete Oilahuasca Safety Profile
document_info.compiled_from: Claude.ai discussions with Rev. Ryan Van Kush, scientific literature
document_info.disclaimer: FOR HARM REDUCTION AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY

beta_asarone_sweet_flag.source: Triploid (European) and Tetraploid (Asian) Acorus calamus varieties
beta_asarone_sweet_flag.safe_variety: ONLY North American diploid (Acorus americanus) - no detectable β-asarone
beta_asarone_sweet_flag.recommendation: Must verify variety or avoid entirely

safrole_toxicity.assessment: Small amounts in spices probably safe for occasional use

apiole_dillapiole_pregnancy_warning.historical_use: Abortifacient properties - used traditionally to induce abortion
apiole_dillapiole_pregnancy_warning.mechanism: Stimulates uterine contractions, increases menstrual flow
apiole_dillapiole_pregnancy_warning.modern_status: No longer used medically - often ineffective, sometimes fatal

drug_interactions_critical.mechanism: All CYP450-metabolized medications affected by oilahuasca herbs
drug_interactions_critical.percentage_affected: Approximately 80% of drugs use CYP450 metabolism
drug_interactions_critical.critical_rule: NEVER combine oilahuasca herbs with prescription medications that use CYP450 metabolism

wellbutrin_strattera_example.warning: NO ONE SHOULD MIX Wellbutrin, Abilify, Ephedrine, and Caffeine
wellbutrin_strattera_example.risk: Can lead to HEART ATTACKS AND SEIZURES
wellbutrin_strattera_example.mechanism: Wellbutrin inhibits CYP2D6, causing blood level accumulation
wellbutrin_strattera_example.combination_potentiation: Combinations can be 5-10x stronger than expected
wellbutrin_strattera_example.seizure_risk: Blood concentration at any given moment determines seizure threshold

grapefruit_juice_analogy.statement: Medications that say 'Do not take with Grapefruit Juice' - this is very serious
grapefruit_juice_analogy.effect: Medications with low bioavailability become MORE bioavailable
grapefruit_juice_analogy.result: Can cause dangerous overdose-level blood concentrations
grapefruit_juice_analogy.connection: This danger is actually what the Oilahuasca Theory is based on

absolute_contraindications.current_medications: CYP450 substrates will have dangerous interactions
absolute_contraindications.psychiatric_conditions: Risk of psychotic episodes or destabilization

harm_reduction_principles.no_combinations: Never combine with other substances (alcohol, cannabis, other drugs)
harm_reduction_principles.verify_sources: Especially for calamus - verify North American diploid variety

estragole_concerns.genotoxic: In some studies at high doses
estragole_concerns.recommendation: Use whole herbs, not concentrated oils; don't use chronically

carcinogen_warning.statement: Possibility that oilahuasca can lead to body creating carcinogens
carcinogen_warning.mechanism: Possible when manipulating breakdown of various molecules
carcinogen_warning.known_cases: No one as far as known has developed cancer from oilahuasca
carcinogen_warning.but: Possibility to raise carcinogen levels in body exists

duration_considerations.extreme_cases: Up to 1 week residual effects possible
duration_considerations.clinical_impracticality: Duration makes this impractical for therapeutic use
